forward_prompts: How long have you been in business?
What kind of clients do you mostly serve?
You mostly take payments in-person or online?
You using Square, Stripe, or someone else?
Do you know your current rate or fee structure?
You mind if I do a quick savings estimate?
Want to see how much you're overpaying right now?
Would lower fees actually help your margins this year?

annual_savings_formula.description: Compare the user's rate vs. a near-zero cash discount model. Assume 93% reduction.
